properties.Name: SafeDepositBoxAgreement

Columns.Name: ContractId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

Columns.Name: GeneralProvisionsStatement
Columns.Description:
Ex:

1.1 The rental agreement of a safe deposit box (hereinafter the Agreement), concluded between "bank name" (hereinafter the Bank) and a private or legal customer (hereinafter the Box-holder), establishes the rights and obligations of the Bank and the Box-holder and the rules for their fulfillment.
1.2 In matters not regulated with this Agreement the Bank and the Box-holder shall be governed by the general terms and conditions of the Bank.

Columns.Name: ObjectOfAgreementStatement
Columns.Description:
Ex:

2.1 According to the Agreement the Bank shall give a safe deposit box located in the Bank's vault to the fixed-term use of the Box-holder for a fee and on conditions as stipulated in the Agreement.

Columns.Name: RentAndGuaranteeOfKeysStatement
Columns.Description:
Ex:

3.1 The Box-holder shall pay the Bank rent for the safe deposit box upon conclusion of the Agreement as a prepayment either in cash or by money transfer in one amount for the entire period of the Agreement. Based on the order of the Box-holder indicated in the Agreement the Bank shall be entitled to debit the rent for the safe deposit box as prepayment for the entire period of the Agreement from the current account provided in the Agreement.
3.2 If the Box-holder requests both keys of the safe deposit box to its disposal, the Bank shall reserve a guarantee sum for the keys in the Box-holder's current account provided in the Agreement or the Box-holder shall pay this amount in cash. The Bank shall release the guarantee sum upon expiry of the Agreement, after returning of both keys of the safe deposit box to the Bank. 
3.3 The rent and guarantee sum of keys of the safe deposit box is established with the price list of the Bank.
3.4 If, upon expiry of the Agreement, the Box-holder fails to vacate the safe deposit box or return the keys, it shall undertake to pay rent until actual vacating of the safe deposit box.

Columns.Name: UseOfSafeDepositBoxStatement
Columns.Description:
Ex:

4.1 The Bank shall deliver the key(s) to the safe deposit box to the Box-holder after the Box-holder has paid the amount of rent and the guarantee sum of keys, in case stipulated in clause 3.2 of the Agreement. 
4.2 The Box-holder undertakes not to keep in its safe deposit box items and substances, which may endanger the safe deposit box, the items stored in other safe deposit boxes, the Bank, the Bank's employees and the environment or the owning of which is prohibited by law. The Bank may request the Box-holder to reveal the contents of the safe deposit box, if there is grounds to believe that the Box-holder has violated the conditions stipulated in this clause.
4.3 Access to the safe deposit box will be granted to the Box-holder and/or its authorized representative during business hours of the Bank.
4.4 For applying access to the rented safe deposit box the Box-holder and/or its representative shall be obliged to present to a bank employee a personal ID acceptable by the bank. The Bank may request certification of the authorization of the person authorized by the Box-holder in a form acceptable by the Bank. 
4.5 A Box-holder or its representative may not stay in the vault for longer than 10 minutes at a time. After the given time the Bank may request the Box-holder and/or its representative to leave the vault.
4.6 No more than two persons may stay in the vault at a time. 
4.7 The Box-holder or its representative undertakes to immediately inform the Bank of loosing of the key(s) to the safe deposit box or possession of the keys by third parties.
4.8 The Box-holder may not sublease the safe deposit box or transfer the rights under this Agreement to any third parties.

Columns.Name: ExpiryAndPretermTerminationStatement
Columns.Description:
Ex:

5.1 This Agreement shall end upon expiry of its term.
5.2 The Box-holder is entitled to terminate the Agreement at any time. If the Box-holder terminates the Agreement or returns to the Bank the key(s) to the safe deposit box before expiry of the Agreement, the Box-holder will not be entitled to request from the Bank proportional compensation for the prepaid rent of the safe deposit box.
5.3 The Bank is entitled to terminate the Agreement pre-term:
5.3.1 in case of repair or closure of a bank office, informing the Box-holder in writing at least one (1) month in advance hereof. The Bank shall refund to the Box-holder the excess amount paid for the safe deposit box rental;
5.3.2 in case of violating the obligation stipulated in clause 4.2 of the Agreement by the Box-holder. The Bank shall establish a term in course of which the Box-holder shall be obliged to vacate the safe deposit box. If the Box-holder fails to fulfill its obligation, the Bank shall be entitled to exercise clause 6.5 of the Agreement.
5.4 Upon pre-term termination of the Agreement the Box-holder shall be obliged to vacate the safe deposit box and return the key(s) to the Bank.

Columns.Name: LiabilityStatement
Columns.Description:
Ex:

6.1 In case of failure to fulfill the contractual obligations, the Bank and the Box-holder shall be liable to the extent and in order as stipulated in law, the general terms and conditions of the Bank and provisions of this Agreement.
6.2 The Bank shall not be held liable for lost or damaged items of the Box-holder, if the Bank's fault has not been established.
6.3 The Box-holder shall be liable for any damage caused to the Bank and third parties resulting from violation of clause 4.2 of the Agreement. 
6.4 In case the key(s) to the safe deposit box are lost, the Bank shall be entitled to the withhold amounts from the current account(s) of the Box-holder at the Bank or from the guarantee sum of the keys to compensate for the loss incurred by the Bank. In case of loosing both keys to the safe deposit box the Box-holder shall undertake to compensate to the Bank in addition also for the costs of opening the safe deposit box and making of new keys and the new lock.
6.5 If the Box-holder has not vacated the safe deposit box or returned the keys within three (3) months after expiry of the agreement, the Bank shall be entitled to withhold the guarantee sum of keys deposited by the Box-holder and/or without a respective order of the Box-holder withhold from any accounts of the Box-holder opened with the Bank the unpaid rent and the sum for opening the safe deposit box, also any other costs incurred by the Bank. The safe deposit box shall be opened and a respective report shall be made about the contents of the safe deposit box. 
6.5.1 If the Box-holder has no current accounts opened with the Bank or if the funds in the accounts are insufficient, the Bank shall be entitled to realize the contents of the safe deposit box. From the amounts received from realization the Bank shall cover the rent, also other costs incurred by the Bank. If the amounts received from the realization of the contents of the safe deposit box and/or the funds kept at the Bank by the Box-holder are insufficient for covering the costs incurred by the Bank and compensating for the lost profit, the Bank shall be entitled to refer the matter to the court for compensation.
